edepa.modelview

Class EventsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
      • edepa.modelview.zothers.EventsAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventsAdapterExhibitor, EventsAdapterFavorites, EventsAdapterOngoing, EventsAdapterSchedule

    public class EventsAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
    Sirve para enlazar las funciones a una actividad en específico
